description: Defines a Polymer web component 'paper-ripple' that provides a ripple visual effect for material design interactions, including styles, behavior, and ripple animation logic.

classes.name: ElementMetrics
classes.description: Utility class for measuring element dimensions and distances.

classes.name: Ripple
classes.description: Represents an individual ripple animation, handling its drawing and interaction states.

methods.name: uiDownAction
methods.description: Handles user interaction to start ripple on pointer down, respecting 'noink'.

methods.name: downAction
methods.description: Starts a ripple effect on pointer down, creating a new ripple instance.

methods.name: uiUpAction
methods.description: Handles user interaction to end ripple on pointer up, respecting 'noink'.

methods.name: upAction
methods.description: Ends the ripple effect for all ripples.

methods.name: addRipple
methods.description: Creates and adds a new ripple instance to the component.

methods.name: animate
methods.description: Performs animation frame updates for ripples.

methods.name: onAnimationComplete
methods.description: Handles cleanup after ripple animation finishes.
